column1: in memory of dorothy white -- gabriel funeral home| first: last: born: october 25
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:gabriel funeral homeport arthur
column7: was the daughter of the late albert and amelia gabriel. she was born in sorrell
column9: 1925. dorothy attended public school in sorrell
column10: louisiana. she was united in matrimony to edward shields and to this union 4 children was born. she was a member of shiloh baptist church for over 60 years. she was formerly a member of the senior choir
column11: and treasurer of the sedonia shields circle until her illness. funeral services will be at 11 a. m. saturday
column13: 2015 with a viewing from 9 a. m. until service time at shilo baptist church. burial will follow in greenlawn memorial park under the direction of gabriel funeral home. she was preceded in death by her parents
column15: and 3 brothers. she is survived by two daughters
column16: lillie m. sells and mary ann coleman of milwaukee
